name: Humans last hope
description:
16-year-old boy Mykolas, as always, was walking through the wasteland, but suddenly he meets an anthropomorphic wolf, he decides to take him to himself for his own reasons, but Mykolas still does not know what will happen to him and his new friend next ...

This is my first game so do not judge strictly and besides this is a demo and the game is available only in Russian for now
